column4: Which jabber client was capable of displaying latex in regular chat messages?
How do I enable that in Pidgin?
its a third party plugin dennda
seems to be a newer fork
i'd recommend using that second one
Is that available in ubuntu repos? It needs to work on windows as well
there's a dll there for windows yes
and there's a .so file there built in debian by the looks of it
It's not in the repos I suppose?
Can I just download that .so file and put it $somewhere?
